metadata.synopsis: Player finds a glaive in a locked room. Reading a nearby book you might learn it was taken from the Shadow cursed lands by Halsin, who found it was infused with dark power. (It does have a special power - the glaive deals 1d6 extra necrotic damage to characters UNLESS they're standing in sunlight.)

0.speaker: Player
0.text: The glaive the druid's notebook mentioned. Its owner thought it was cursed...

1.speaker: Player
1.text: A beautiful glaive. So why does touching it give me a knot in my stomach?
